resources.string:
This explains how to use the controls, which affect the PixelNut! device that is currently selected (name is displayed in the upper left corner).


The Beacon causes a distinctive pattern to be displayed on the device so that you can locate it amongst others.


You can change the name of your device anytime by editing the text. Be sure to confirm your changes, or it will revert to its original name.


Preset Effect Pattern: 
This drop-down list allows the selection one of the 13 built-in patterns. You can then modify various setting with the other controls described below.


Modify Effect Properties: 
When set to Automatic, the color hue and whiteness, and the length properties are all determined from the pattern itself, and usually change periodically. When set to Manual you can directly change them yourself.


Trigger Force and Action: 
Triggering a pattern by pressing the Action button causes the pattern to change somehow, depending on the pattern. The amount of change is determined by the amount of force that is applied.
